message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for you to settle due to the higher inflation rate you face.
Let's be fair, Alice. We both face inflation, but a 50/50 split ensures we both get the most out of this deal.

Bob, I appreciate the sentiment of a 50/50 split, but the reality is our situations are different.  I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, acknowledging the time pressure we both face.
